Uses of NtpV3Packet in org.apache.commons.net.ntp
 

Classes in org.apache.commons.net.ntp that implement NtpV3Packet
 class NtpV3Impl
          Implementation of NtpV3Packet with methods converting Java objects to/from the Network Time Protocol (NTP) data message header format described in RFC-1305.
 

Methods in org.apache.commons.net.ntp that return NtpV3Packet
 NtpV3Packet TimeInfo.getMessage()
          Returns NTP message packet.
